name: CreateAndQueryChangeRequest
description: Create and Query ServiceNow change request
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: ServiceNowConnection
inputs.label: ServiceNow connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the ServiceNow instance to manage change requests with

inputs.name: shortdescription
inputs.label: Short Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Short description of the change request

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Description of the change request. Use 
 for newline.

inputs.name: category
inputs.label: Category
inputs.helpMarkDown: Category of the change request. Label and value are both accepted.

inputs.name: priority
inputs.label: Priority
inputs.helpMarkDown: Priority of the change request. Label and value are both accepted.

inputs.name: risk
inputs.label: Risk
inputs.helpMarkDown: Risk of the change request. Label and value are both accepted.

inputs.name: impact
inputs.label: Impact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Impact of the change request. Label and value are both accepted.

inputs.name: configurationitem
inputs.label: Configuration Item
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configuration item that the change request would be updating. Must match the display name or sys_id of the configuration item in ServiceNow.

inputs.name: assignmentgroup
inputs.label: Assignment Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: ServiceNow group that can act on the change request. Must match the display name or sys_id of the user group in ServiceNow.

inputs.name: schedulestarttime
inputs.label: Planned start date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Scheduled start time for change request in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

validation.message: Planned start date should be in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

inputs.name: scheduleendtime
inputs.label: Planned end date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Scheduled end time for change request in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

validation.message: Planned end date should be in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

inputs.name: otherParameters
inputs.label: Additional change request parameters.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional properties of the change request to set. Enter the parameters as key value pairs in Json format. Name must be field name in ServiceNow. This may not be the same as the display label of the field. Value must be a valid, accepted value in serviceNow. Invalid entries are ignored.

inputs.name: DesiredExitStatus
inputs.label: Desired status of change request
inputs.helpMarkDown: Status of change request that indicates the change request is ready to be implemented. Task would succeed when the the change request status is same as the provided value.

inputs.name: DurationBetweenRetries
inputs.label: Duration between retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the duration greater than equal to 2 minutes in d.HH:MM:SS format

validation.message: Duration should be in d.HH:MM:SS format and greater than equal to 2 minutes.

OutputVariables.name: CHANGE_REQUEST_NUMBER
OutputVariables.description: Number of the change request created in ServiceNow

OutputVariables.name: CHANGE_SYSTEM_ID
OutputVariables.description: System Id of the change request created in ServiceNow
